Original:
非常喜歡闆娘的個性，大方親切，平易近人，對待客人如同朋友一般對待。

餐點偏向美式，多以漢堡、三明治及炸物為主，口味偏重，酒單選擇豐富，也有Happy hour for buy two get one free! Really like it 🥰

I like the personality of Ban Niang very much, generous and kind, approachable, treat guests like friends.

The meal is biased towards American style, mostly burgers, sandwiches and fried objects. The taste is heavy. The wine list is rich. There are also Happy Hour for Buy Two Get One Free! Really like it 🥰 🥰 🥰 🥰 🥰 🥰 🥰 🥰 🥰 🥰 🥰 🥰

Original:
2023.08.12
吧台20張，靠牆單人座8張，雙人桌3張。
低消250元/人，不收服務費。

老闆娘親切，19:00~21:00是happy hours，生啤、shots、基本調酒買二送一。
生啤酒的菜單在店內左右黑板上，不定期更換種類與精釀品牌。
生啤酒190～300元/杯，330～800ml都有。

餐點除了漢堡、三明治外，幾乎都是炸物；吃素的話，也有供應未來肉做的漢堡。
生啤酒的種類會不定時更新，老闆娘對生啤口味與特色瞭若指掌，店內還有不少限定調酒。
除了音樂外，吧台內會播放netflix的英文電影。

2023.08.12兩人用餐，打折後約2100元：
招牌牛肉堡200元＋副餐起司雞圈圈70元
美式經典牛肉堡180元
炸水牛城辣醬雞翅260元
炸魚薯條（可自選2種醬料）350元
Hoegaarden豪格登白啤酒800ml/杯/300元
Guinness健力士黑啤酒330ml/杯/220元
Mountain lager百岳拉格500ml/杯/250元
Guava beer芭樂啤酒500ml/杯/260元（很甜）
Edeweiss艾德懷斯花香白啤330ml/杯/190元
DIPA雙倍啤酒花500ml/杯/270元（意外的不太苦澀，還帶點甜）
Disco macaw juicy pale ale金剛鸚舞500ml/杯/260元
EN:
2023.08.12
There are 20 bar storage stations, 8 single seats on the wall, and 3 double tables.
Low 250 yuan/person, no service fee.

The boss is kind, from 19: 00 ~ 21: 00 is Happy Hours, raw beer, Shots, and basic bartending buy two get one free.
The menu of raw beer is on the blackboard on the left and right of the store, and the types and craft brands are replaced from time to time.
Raw beer is 190-300 yuan/cup, 330 to 800ml.

In addition to hamburgers and sandwiches, meals are almost all fried. If vegetarian, there are also burgers that provide future meat.
The types of raw beer will be updated from time to time. The boss is the taste and characteristics of the raw beer.
In addition to music, NETFLIX English movies will be played in the bar.

2023.08.12 The two meals, about 2100 yuan after discount:
Signature beef castle 200 yuan + a second meal from the second meal, the chicken circle 70 yuan
American classic beef castle 180 yuan
Fried Water Bull City spicy chicken wings 260 yuan
Fryfront -fried fish and fries (2 kinds of sauces can be selected) 350 yuan
Hoegaarden Haogu Bai Beer 800ml/cup/300 yuan
Guinness Benchis Black Beer 330ml/Cup/220 yuan
Mountain lager Baiyue Laguer 500ml/cup/250 yuan
GUAVA Beer Bero Beer 500ml/Cup/260 yuan (very sweet)
EDEWEISS Edwais Flower Fragrant White Beer 330ml/Cup/190 yuan
DIPA double beer 500ml/cup/270 yuan (the accident is not too bitter, but also a little sweet)
Disco Macaw Juicy Pale Ale Moda Parley Dance 500ml/Cup/260 yuan

Original:
啤酒都喝完了。  沒有嘶嘶聲。  我們喝的一種飲料太淡了，嘗起來像醋。
我希望我們的訪問沒有生病。
這是我們在台北去過的最糟糕的酒吧。  根據我的經驗，這裡的啤酒是亞洲保存最差的啤酒。

建議房東和工作人員參加有關如何保存啤酒的課程。  短期建議僅供應瓶裝啤酒。

漢堡還可以。  但他們現在沒有薯條了，只有裹著糖的馬鈴薯球。

當你收到帳單時只告訴你最終金額。  必須要求破解。

整體來說真的很差而且建議不安全。  確實不應該這樣操作。

請造訪其他酒吧......
EN:
The beer is finished.No one.The drink we drank was too light, and it was like vinegar.
I hope our visit is not sick.
This is the worst bar we have been in Taipei.According to my experience, the beer here is the worst -preserved beer in Asia.

It is recommended that landlords and staff members participate in courses on how to save beer.In the short term, it is recommended to supply only bottle beer.

Burger is okay.But they do not have fries now, only potato balls wrapped in sugar.

Just tell you the final amount when you receive the bill.Must require cracking.

Overall is really bad and it is not safe.It should not be operated like this.

Please visit other bars ...

Original:
當然不是當地人的酒吧，但氣氛很好，飲料很好，價格也很合理。如果您在探索拉霍後正在努力尋找一杯像樣的飲料，我會推薦醉龍......此外，這個名字是無與倫比的！

當我們離開時，我還要對他們的服務表示感謝。當酒保主動提出幫我們叫計程車時，我們已經結帳了。當第一輛計程車沒有出現時，調酒師出來告訴我們她已經訂了另一輛計程車，並為我們指出了我們的車。這項服務遠遠超出了預期。
EN:
Of course, it is not a local bar, but the atmosphere is very good, the drink is good, and the price is reasonable.If you are trying to find a decent drink after exploring Rajah, I will recommend drunk dragon ... In addition, this name is unparalleled!

When we leave, I would also like to thank their services.When the bartender proposed to call us a taxi, we had already checked.When the first taxi did not appear, the bartender came out to tell us that she had already booked another taxi and pointed out our car.This service far exceeds expectations.

Original: 我在逛饒河街夜市時偶然發現了這家酒吧。老闆非常友好，氣氛非常好。他們甚至會製作您點餐時菜單上沒有的雞尾酒。他們也賣漢堡之類的簡單小吃，我點的辣椒薯條上面放著做工精良的辣椒，所以我非常喜歡它們。如果您在該地區閒逛並想在進入住宿之前喝一兩杯，推薦您來這裡。
EN: I accidentally discovered the bar when I was shopping at Raohe Street Night Market.The boss is very friendly and the atmosphere is very good.They even make cocktails not on the menu when ordering.They also sell simple snacks such as Hamburg. The chili fries I ordered were put on good workmanship, so I like them very much.If you stroll around the area and want to drink one or two cups before entering the accommodation, I recommend you to come here.

Original: 這家酒吧是一次很棒的經驗。工作人員會說英語並且非常熱情。週二進來的人都很友善。它有一種社區意識，而且他們是本地人。他們有一張地圖，顯示人們來自世界各地。飲料價格對我來說很好。不過，雞肉三明治可能是我吃過的最好的三明治。儘管我在台灣待了一個星期，但這個地方將是我離開前的最後一晚。另外，貓是老大。
EN: This bar is a great experience.The staff speaks English and is very enthusiastic.Those who come in on Tuesday are very friendly.It has a community consciousness and they are locals.They have a map that shows people from all over the world.The price of drinks is very good for me.However, chicken sandwiches may be the best sandwiches I have ever eaten.Although I stayed in Taiwan for a week, this place will be the last night before I leave.In addition, the cat is the boss.

Original: 我在台北最喜歡的景點之一。漢堡棒極了，雞尾酒棒極了，一隻貓在酒吧閒逛，店主也很好。我喜歡幽靜但溫馨的氛圍。

Original:
提供優質生啤酒、輪換菜單、浸泡雞尾酒和利口酒，以及美味的酒吧食品。油炸食品和漢堡都很正宗，醬汁都是自製的。業主非常友好，母語是英語，並付出額外的努力來確保每個人都玩得開心。

它既是在附近酒吧喝一杯的好地方，也是您來到亞洲和台灣特別是想要結識新朋友時經常找到的那種酒吧。

另一個好處是，與城裡其他地方相比，這裡的價格相當低，而且你喝的東西也很難在其他地方買到，尤其是他們在家裡混合的東西。

已經來過很多次了，而且還會繼續去，因為它是一個很好的聚會場所，值得從地鐵站多走幾步到達那裡。抵達時，Youbike 停車場也很近。

編輯內容包括截至 2024 年初的菜單註釋、店主會說英語和文法內容。
EN:
Provide high -quality raw beer, rotary menu, soaking cocktails and liquor, and delicious bar food.Both fried food and burgers are authentic, and the sauce is self -made.The owner is very friendly, his mother tongue is English, and extra efforts are made to ensure that everyone has fun.

It is not only a good place to drink in a nearby bar, but also the kind of bar you often find when you come to Asia and Taiwan, especially when you want to meet new friends.

Another advantage is that compared with other places in the city, the price here is quite low, and it is difficult to buy things you drink, especially what they mixes at home.

It has been here many times, and it will continue, because it is a good place for party, it is worth getting a few more steps from the subway station.When you arrive, the Youbike parking lot is also very close.

Edit content includes the menu notes for the beginning of 2024, the owner speaks English and grammar content.

Original: 這裡的調酒師非常友善（不確定現在是否還一樣（我在2019年1月下旬來過））。小吃的品質也很棒。不過價格有點高，而且啤酒的味道比韓國淡一些（這當然是個人感覺），所以去的時候最好記住這一點。不過，我認為如果您住在附近，這是一個值得停留的好地方。

Original:
身為一個21歲的新美國人，在我的冒險經歷中，我還沒有走進一家飲酒場所，立即充滿喜悅和興奮，並在同一波情緒中感受到平靜的感覺。當然，直到我進入醉龍。從入口處門上令人難以置信的手繪藝術作品吸引您到這個機構的入口點，到您走進這些門時遇到的友好的面孔。倒飲料時手上的力道很大，面帶微笑，椅子很舒服；你還能要求什麼？別擔心，醉龍已經為你解答了這個問題。這裡也有機會度過一個輕鬆的夜晚，也有機會遇見您未來的另一半。我的夜晚還很年輕，充滿了恐懼，但我要結束了。請記住，您可以擠奶任何有乳頭的東西。重點是吃西紅柿沒有公式。
-傑夫
EN:
As a 21 -year -old new American, in my adventure experience, I have not entered a drinking place, and I was full of joy and excitement, and felt a calm feeling in the same wave of emotions.Of course, until I entered the drunk dragon.From the incredible hand -painted art works on the entrance door attract you to the entrance point of this institution, to the friendly faces you encounter when you walk into these doors.The strength of the hand when I pour the drink, with a smile, and the chair is very comfortable; what else can you ask?Don't worry, Drunk Dragon has answered this question for you.There is also a chance to spend a relaxed night here, and there is also a chance to meet the other half of your future.My night is still young and full of fear, but I am going to end.Remember, you can milk anything with nipples.The point is that there is no formula for eating tomatoes.
-Jeff

Original: 超級友好的氛圍，在這裡工作的人對當地人和外國人都非常友好。強烈推薦這個地方給那些想要與朋友一起度過美好時光的人。
EN: The super -friendly atmosphere is very friendly to the locals and foreigners here.Strongly recommend this place for those who want to spend a good time with friends.

Original: 很棒的酒吧。價格合理，還有熱情的調酒師/老闆。強烈建議您在饒河夜市附近查看。
EN: A great bar.The price is reasonable, and there are enthusiastic bartenders/barter.It is strongly recommended that you check it near Raohe Night Market.

Original: 良好的氛圍和精釀啤酒的選擇。與美味的水牛城爆米花雞搭配得很好。
EN: Good atmosphere and choice of craft beer.Match well with the delicious buffalo city popcorn chicken.

Original: 我建議如果來台北一定要來這家酒吧，酒吧老闆很友善，如果有機會再來的話，下次見Satoru。
